characters: Driver of a white SUV, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road approaching an intersection. A white SUV is seen moving from the left side of the frame towards the right, gradually entering the lane of the observer vehicle. A motorcyclist is also visible on the left side of the frame, moving towards the intersection.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The white SUV is moving from the left side of the frame towards the right, indicating a potential cut-in behavior. The motorcyclist is moving towards the intersection, which may require the self-driving vehicle to decelerate to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white SUV, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the right lane, potentially cutting into the observer vehicles lane. 2) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the intersection, potentially crossing the observer vehicles path.
